front.reference:
Proc Indian Natn Sci Acad 81 No. 1 February 2015 Special Issue, pp. 174-178
c
Printed in India.

docTitle.titlePart:
Modified Surface Tension of a QGP-Droplet Under One Loop Correction in
Peshier Potential

byline.docAuthor: S SOMORENDRO SINGH 1 , AGAM K JHA * 2 and K K GUPTA 3

byline.affiliation: 1 Department of Physics and Astrophysics, University of Delhi,
3 Department of Physics, Kirori Mal College, University of Delhi,

front.div:
Under one loop correction in Peshier potential surface tension of a Quark-Gluon Plasma (QGP) droplet
has been recomputed. The correction reduces the stable size of a QGP droplet. The value of surface
tension obtained here is in better agreement with the current lattice result.
front.keyword: Key Words : Quark-Gluon Plasma; Quark-Hadron Phase Transition
